content: our simple baby mitts are the perfect project to make for a new baby in your life - mom will love how easy it is to slip on these thumbless mittens they can be knit singly or connected with an icord and use approximately 30g of fingering weight yarn 1 https //handknityarnstudio com/collections/project-kits/products/baby-bundle-kit 2 https //handknityarnstudio com/collections/julie-asselin/products/leizufingering
